project_descr: UN REDD Programmatic Support to Implementation of Myanmar’s REDD+ Readiness Roadmap.

outputs.output_descr: This output aims to enhance institutional and communities' capacity for environmental conservation and use of natural resources.
donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT

document_name: UN Reducing Emission from Deforestation and Forest Degradation (REDD) Programatic Support to Implementation of Myanmar's REDD+Readiness Roadmap
